headline: Ram Named Official Truck Partner of WWE, UFC and PBR
summary: Ram announces a dynamic partnership with TKO Group Holdings (NYSE: TKO) that brings together WWE, a global leader in sports entertainment, UFC, the world's premier mixed martial arts organization, and PBR, the world's premier bull-riding organization. This collaboration unites three of the most electrifying sports and entertainment properties with the strength and durability of Ram trucks, creating unforgettable experiences for fans across the country.
